product_name: Mountain Hardwear Nut Team Logo Ball Cap - Men's
long_description: A casual hat that shades your eyes while you catch a fly ball or chill by the pool, the Mountain Hardwear Nut Team Logo Ball Cap tops off your everyday wardrobe with subtle style. Durable woven cotton canvas fabric. Rip-and-stick rear adjustment. Mountain Hardwear Nut Team Logo Ball Cap has eyelets at crown for ventilation.
short_description: A casual hat that shades your eyes while you catch a fly ball or chill by the pool, the Mountain Hardwear Nut Team Logo Ball Cap tops off your everyday wardrobe with subtle style.
